security_audit.summary: Prompt-based skill with local utility scripts for SEO content generation. No malicious behavior detected. Scripts perform benign file operations and optional network calls to legitimate services (Google APIs) for SEO analysis.

low_findings.title: Optional network requests for SEO analysis
low_findings.description: The pele-seo-auditor.py script includes optional network capabilities using the 'requests' library (lines 49-60) and calls Google PageSpeed Insights API (lines 856-875). These are legitimate for SEO analysis but represent network functionality.

content.value_statement: Creating optimized web pages for Google ranking takes significant time and expertise. This skill provides a proven methodology, templates, and validation scripts to generate 50+ SEO pages quickly with professional quality.
actual_capabilities: Generate batch articles with proper structure
Analyze SEO issues with audit scripts
limitations: Requires manual review of generated content
Does not submit pages to search engines
Templates are for medical/surgical content context

use_cases.title: Medical Practice SEO
use_cases.description: Create optimized service pages for procedures like endomidface, browlift, and deep neck lift with proper schema markup.

use_cases.title: Local Service Websites
use_cases.description: Generate location-based landing pages and service descriptions to dominate local Google results.

use_cases.title: Client Content Production
use_cases.description: Scale content production with templates and validation scripts for multiple client projects.

prompt_templates.title: Create Service Page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an SEO-optimized page for [SERVICE NAME] with: URL /[slug]/, keyword [primary keyword], H1 with keyword, 2000+ words, FAQ section with 7 questions, and MedicalProcedure schema. Use copy from references/copy-bank.md.

prompt_templates.title: Generate Blog Article
prompt_templates.prompt: Write a blog article targeting [KEYWORD] with: meta title under 60 chars, meta description 120-155 chars, H1 with keyword, 1500+ words, Article schema, internal links to /tecnicas/[page]/ pages. Follow tone-guide.md.

prompt_templates.title: Batch Page Creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate batch pages using scripts/generate-batch.py with config containing page definitions. Output to ./src/app directory following Astro 5.x structure from stack-astro.md.

prompt_templates.title: SEO Validation
prompt_templates.prompt: Run scripts/validate-seo.py to audit ./src/app directory. Check title length (30-60 chars), description (120-160 chars), H1 count (exactly 1), content (1500+ words), and 5+ internal links. Report score and issues.

best_practices: Always use pre-approved copy from references/copy-bank.md for headlines and quotes
Follow tone-guide.md to maintain consistent professional and didactic voice
Validate each page with validate-seo.py before deployment
Include at least 5 internal links to build site authority
anti_patterns: Using aggressive or confrontational language against competitors
Making claims without supporting data and statistics
Creating pages without proper H1, meta title, or meta description
Skipping schema markup on service and blog pages

faq.question: What languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: The skill includes templates and workflows for Portuguese, English, and Spanish content with hreflang support.

faq.question: What is the minimum content length per page?
faq.answer: Technique and service pages require 2000+ words. Blog articles need 1500+ words for proper ranking.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing Astro project?
faq.answer: Follow stack-astro.md for project structure. Output generated pages to src/pages or src/content directories.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using the scripts?
faq.answer: Yes. All scripts run locally on your machine. Network calls only go to Google APIs for performance metrics.

faq.question: The validation script shows errors, what now?
faq.answer: The script provides specific fix suggestions. Common issues: short title, missing description, multiple H1 tags, too few internal links.

faq.question: How is this different from other SEO tools?
faq.answer: This skill combines proven methodology (James/Diesel Dudes) with specialized templates for medical/surgical content and validation scripts.
